about_the_game:
"Lips Breaker" is the first brick game to introduce face control technology, the mouth shape as the real-time shape of the ball baffles, you need to flexibly shake the mouth in front of the camera to control the baffles to bounce the ball, smash all the bricks to win. Please become the "mouth strong king" in the field of brick games.

Main feature

The game consists of 8 chapters, each with 9 levels, for a total of 72 levels.

  • 18 unique items (including buffs and debuffs), adding a number of items associated with mouth movements to the functionality of traditional brick-fighting games.

  • 18 unique types of bricks (different strengths, each with characteristics and functions).

  • 18 different functional organs, players can move the head, adjust the nose and face orientation, to control the various organs in the scene.

  • 10 kinds of creatures (including bosses), this game introduces creatures and Boss Settings, adds throwing props to the brick game, and uses moai stone statues as challenging bosses.
